channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest/Soulcatcher (no relation to the old one)
channel.description:
> # [color = "steblue"] Priest [/color] > **[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Killer [/color]** > Passive: Devout - You gain any passives that the confessed player had > > Night Ability 1: Confessions - Kill target player if they have performed a negative action or betrayed anyone. (Anyone who has been converted, occupied anyone, redirected anyone, framed, mind warped ect. Converting does not count. Preventing does not count). Counts as a regular attack. Gets disabled after you have successfully killed someone once. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Soulbind - Use the primary ability of the person you killed. If they were converted you use the ability of their original class. (unlimited)
> # [color = "purple"] Soulcatcher [/color] > **[color = "purple"] Unseen Offensive [/color]** > > Night Ability 1: Collect Soul - If target player dies you will get their soul. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Unleash Soul - You may use the primary night ability of any dead player who's soul you have collected. (Unlimited 1 day cooldown)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest/Soulcatcher (no relation to the old one)
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Nah, claim Alch as Prince. Both BD and Evils will clearly leave you alone after you do this. What could possibly go wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest/Soulcatcher (no relation to the old one)
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 1: Confessions - Kill target player if they have performed a negative action or betrayed anyone. (Anyone who has been converted, occupied anyone, redirected anyone, framed, mind warped ect. Converting does not count. Preventing does not count). Counts as a regular attack. Gets disabled after you have successfully killed someone once. (Unlimited)

Balanced.
/s

NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 2: Unleash Soul - You may use the primary night ability of any dead player who’s soul you have collected. (Unlimited 1 day cooldown)

How is this offensive abillity while you can use different types?

Read full topic
